Plot: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.
Title: Fighting
Actors: Channing Tatum, Terrence Howard, Zulay Henao, Michael Rivera
tomatoConsensus: Though Fighting has a likable lead performer, and the fight scenes are impressive, the paper-thin plot ultimately unravels.
